channel.title: Need a banner for a server toplist site
channel.description:
So I need a banner. It needs to be roughly 500x200, but don't constrict yourself too heavily on size. The only text I need on it is "Project Recovery 317". It's a 317 server, so do the best you can at giving it an old school runescape theme. I'd prefer it to not be too bright, but still catch your eye and stand out at the same time. I'd rather it look more professional than something a 9 year old drew in paint. Thanks, and let me know if you need any other specifications. I'm trying to leave a lot of room for creativity, so surprise me.
If you're interested in playing as well, PM me and I'll give you the link to the server's site, as there's currently a contest for who can make the best banner.

item.title: Need a banner for a server toplist site

item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

Great, glad I could help
